strings.Value: "The crushing defeat of the bandit king and his countless forces! A mighty troll empire invading the kobolds. Disease. Conquering half of the world â€” and now this... I won't even have to make anything up!"
"I will never understand how danger and death make for entertainment."
"Romantic maximalism and vulgar hyperbole are stock and trade of amateurs and graphomaniacs. Oh, who am I talking to... no one here even understands these words..."
"Sometimes even I can scarcely believe that so many exciting things can happen to the same people in such a short time! Imagine the readers of your book..."
"Better just make up. Don't write about us. Me ever."
